translations: 过分瘦长的；动作笨拙难看的
笨拙地移动（gangle 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: His gangling, awkward gait has earned him the name Spiderman.
sentences.translation: 他因其笨拙且奇怪的步态而得名“蜘蛛侠”。

sentences.sentence: George, despite his great height and gangling walk, was a great dancer.
sentences.translation: 尽管乔治身材高大，步态笨拙，舞却跳得好极了。

sentences.sentence: A rare survivor of the deadly "flux", Margaret teams up with Franklin, a decent, gangling emigrant from a western state, and heads for the Atlantic.
sentences.translation: 玛格·丽特- - - - -一场可怕涨潮下的罕见存活者与弗兰克林- - - - -一个外表体面，身材瘦长的西方移民结伴上了路，向大西洋方向行进。
